item.title: How to handle duplicated events in Kafka
item.description: As we are using Kafka as our messaging broker for event sourcing and Kafka guarantees messages are delivered to consumers at least once. that means we will have duplicated events that have to be handled gracefully. There are several ways to handle duplicate messages. Idempotency Vector clock

item.title: Desgin
item.description: #Light-eventuate conceptual model Entity An entity is a business object such as an Order. An entity is an instance of an EntityType. In Domain-Driven Design terms, an entity is an aggregate. Each entity has an ID, unique among instances of the same entity type, which you can choose or allow Eventuate to assign to you. An entity has a sequence of one or more events.
